data.title: Why Bitcoin Lost $900M in ETF Outflows While Solana Gained $531M
data.description: In mid-November 2025, investors pulled nearly $900 million from spot Bitcoin ETFs in a single day, marking the second-largest withdrawal since the funds launched in January 2024. The outflows came as Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) fell below $95,000 for the first time in six months. Solana (CRYPTO: SOL) ETFs attracted capital instead. The funds attracted $531 ... Why Bitcoin Lost $900M in ETF Outflows While Solana Gained $531M
